title: Exmood
subtitle: Improving Mental Wellness Through Intuitive Mobile Experience
description: EXMOOD is a mobile application designed to help users manage and improve their mental well-being. It offers mood tracking, meditation guidance, professional counseling, and a personal journey feature that supports emotional regulation. The app focuses on delivering a calm, intuitive experience that can be used by teens and adults facing mental health challenges.

content.label: The Problem
content.content: Many young adults struggle with mental health issues but lack access to trusted information, affordable counseling, and supportive tools. Existing sources often feel overwhelming, unclear, or inaccessible, making it harder for users to manage their daily emotional challenges.

content.label: Challenge
content.content: Designing a mobile experience that simplifies complex mental-health content into something warm, clear, and easy to use. Creating emotional safety, intuitive navigation, and efficient task flowsâ€”while balancing multiple features like mood tracking, counseling, meditation, and personal activities.

content.label: The Solution
content.content: I designed a calm, structured interface centered around clarity and emotional comfort. The experience guides users effortlessly through mood detection, meditation sessions, and professional counseling. Clean layouts, soft color palettes, and consistent interaction patterns help users focus on healing, learning, and self-reflection.

content.label: Summary
content.content: EXMOOD delivers a modern, user-friendly approach to mental-health support. With clear flows, soft visuals, and accessible tools, the app empowers users to understand their emotions, access help, and build healthier daily habits.
